card_usp: Earn 4X rewards on all retail spends + bonus 4X rewards on monthly spends over INR 20,000. No Joining Fee, Free lounge access, Fuel Surcharge waiver and many more.

eligibility_criteria: Applicant’s age should be between 18 and 65 years for Salaried person and for Self Employed age should be 18 and 67 years. Minimum age for add-on cardholder is 18 years. Applicants should have a stable monthly income. Applicants should belong to credit card sourcing cities/locations of the Bank. All applications are subject to credit and other policy checks of the Bank.
terms_and_conditions: All dues must be paid on time; rewards program subject to change.
